<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157594</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1908</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Greek Mythology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechische Mythologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mythologie Grecque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mythology Grego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mitologia Greca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνική μυθολογία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mitología Griega</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for intermmediate English students, where the student learns about Greek Mythology, answers questions on the subject and then takes a quiz.This worksheet was prepared by a 10th grade student</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Greek Mythology</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für intermmediate 
englische Kursteilnehmer, in denen der Kursteilnehmer über 
griechische Mythologie erlernt, beantwortet Fragen über das Thema und
nimmt dann einen quiz.This Bogen wurde vorbereitet von einem 10. 
Gradkursteilnehmer</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais d'intermmediate, où l'étudiant se renseigne sur 
la mythologie grecque, répond à des questions sur le sujet et puis 
prend un tableau de quiz.This a été préparée par un 10ème 
étudiant de catégorie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses do intermmediate, onde o estudante aprende sobre o
mythology grego, responde a perguntas no assunto e faz exame então de
uma folha de quiz.This foi preparada por um 10o estudante da classe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli 
allievi inglesi del intermmediate, in cui l'allievo impara circa la 
mitologia greca, risponde alle domande sull'oggetto ed allora prende 
un foglio di lavoro di quiz.This è stata preparata da un decimo 
allievo del grado</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές intermmediate, όπου ο σπουδαστής 
μαθαίνει για την ελληνική μυθολογία, απαντά στις ερωτήσεις στο 
θέμα και παίρνει έπειτα έναν διαγωνισμό γνώσεων Αυτό το 
φύλλο εργασίας προετοιμάστηκε από έναν 10ο σπουδαστή βαθμού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses del intermmediate, donde el estudiante aprende 
sobre la mitología griega, contesta a preguntas sobre el tema y 
después toma una hoja de trabajo de quiz.This fue preparada por un 
10mo estudiante del grado</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechische Mythologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mythologie Grecque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mythology Grego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mitologia Greca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνική μυθολογία</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mitología Griega</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
